questions.author: Victor Ikenye
questions.content: A little girl kicks a soccer ball. It goes 10 feet and comes back to her?

questions.author: Sharon Wairimu
questions.content: A is the father of B. But B is not the son of A?
questions.notes: I read it somewhere and its been stuck in my mind for quite a while

answers.author: Vincent Muya
answers.content: Ever heard of gravity? She kicked it up
